data.message: Bjeezus. Its a fuckin trailer park. Omg lets make this mess a historical landmarker....he is a fucking pop star, omg a foul mouthed @sshole gets a freakin record deal....give me a fucking break.

replies.message: Nope it's a residential street buddy
And he's more than a foul mouthed pop star. Greatest rapper of all time. Nobody holds a candle to his talent.
From the same guy that types fucking and "@sshole"
Right?! ... :)   who does that shi ... z?

Here is a little secret between u and me... that marshall guy?... not bad at rhymin... has some life experience... just a white guy who is famous for being white in a field that is dominated by another race and they let him in so they could get more attention and make more money..
Weird and really unfair how it works that way right?
Sux. Not to b him obviously
Had he never made it to the bigs i could totally sympathize.  But... he has. He is a 1 percenter. He is the oppressive rich. The proletariat, the bourgouises
I owe him nothing. He owes me nothing. He has music he has made that i enjoy. He doesn't get to be an icon just because he is white and he raps.  :p
He is not an idol, and most definitely not any kind of god no matter how much u might love "rapgod"
Grow up. His best songs were peurile pandering to a generation behind his own. Almost every musician that is "popular" falls into that category...here, have a grammy, u showed up. ;D
